name: Ramen Repair
description:
A First-Person-Repairer in 3D  made at global game jam 2020. The players mission is to fix the cracks in the local dam by shooting noodles at them with a bow. But be careful, the angry chefs might try to eat them!

Draw bow - Hold RMB (right-mouse-button).

Fire noodles - LMB (left-mouse-button)

Credits

Game Design - Katarina Nordenberg

Programming - Gilbert Nordhammar, Björn Bengtsson, Christoffer Tornell

2D-graphics - Sophie Högsta, Katarina Nordenberg

3D-graphics - Carl Myhrén

Animation - Max Burman

Sound - Christoffer Tornell

Music - Leonora Pihl

Voice Acting - Carl Myhrén
